mapper.insert: insert into teaminfo(no ,leaderemail, part, task ,ability, advantage, headcount ) values(#{no},#{leaderemail},#{part},#{task},#{ability},#{advantage},#{headcount})
mapper.select: select no, leaderemail, part, task, ability, advantage, headcount from teaminfo where no=#{no} and leaderemail=#{leaderemail}
mapper.update: update teaminfo set part=#{part}, task=#{task}, ability=#{ability}, advantage=#{advantage}, headcount=#{headcount} where no=#{no} and leaderemail=#{leaderemail}
mapper.delete: delete from teaminfo where no=#{no} and leaderemail=#{leaderemail} and part=#{part}
